name: Craft Rise Shorts - Women's
description: Comfort for long hours in the saddle. The supportive Infinity C4 chamois lets you keep your mind on your ride. Part of Craft’s Core line, these shorts are at home on weekend tours, club rides, or your first Gran Fondo.Lightweight nylon blend has a comfortable 4-way stretch and wicks away moisture.Mesh upper is breathable and helps wick away moisture.Infinity C4 chamois uses Oeko-Tex® 100 materials and has multiple densities of foam to provide comfort on longer rides.Silicone leg grippers hold hems in place.Reflective detailing.OEKO-TEX 100 certified fabric adds confidence that what's next to your skin is made with the utmost care.Craft fits long and lean. If you're between sizes, Craft suggests sizing up.
